spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout is correct, but door orientations for the bedroom and bathroom differ from the 2D swing directions. Windows have been added to the left-side wall which are not present in the original floor plan.

structural_fidelity.notes: Major hallucination of second balcony/terrace space attached to the bedroom that is not in the source. Utility room and kitchen boundary wall is partially merged.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture mapping is exceptionally high fidelity, matching the layout, count, and color scheme of the sofa, dining table, and bedding.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Excellent rendering quality with clean geometry, warm interior lighting, and a perfect isometric camera angle.

detected_errors.description: Hallucination of extra windows on the western wall and a secondary terrace/balcony outside the bedroom.
Door swing orientation for bedroom and bathroom does not match the 2D plan.
Misplaced kitchen appliance layout; oven and stove shifted relative to the sink position.
